name: css-tic-tac-toe
description: A game of tic-tac-toe built entirely out of css and html (NO JS!)

scripts.dev: yarn nodemon -e js,css --watch scripts --watch src/ --exec "yarn build && yarn serve"
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && node scripts/build-html.js && cp src/styles.css dist/

author: Luke Batchelor
